attributes.action: Israel should be charged with war crimes for the civilian death.
attributes.additional_details:
Palestinians want Israel to be hauled before the International Criminal Court

They claim that the country's attack on Gaza resulted in war crimes.

When 10 people was killed in a strike near a UN-run school housing Palestinians displaced by the Gaza conflict.

UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon described the attack as a "moral outrage and a criminal act".
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu must be charged with instructing to slaughter civilians.
